snippet: Five Republican members of Congress have accused Huma Abedin, the wife of former Representative Anthony D. Weiner, of having connections to the Muslim Brotherhood.
abstract: Five Republican members of Congress have accused Huma Abedin, the wife of former Representative Anthony D. Weiner, of having connections to the Muslim Brotherhood.

headline.main: Accusation and Interview Put Spotlight on Weiner's Wife
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Charges and Interview Put the Spotlight on Weiner’s Wife
